PHLOX: Daz, I have been excited to try your new voyager stones, after hearing so much about the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop's</color> newest invention!
2 1
PHLOX: However, when I use the voyager stone, I cannot distinguish how it is dissimilar from a normal projection stone.. How does one use this new invention correctly?
3 2
DAZ: It should simply be used the same way as a normal projection stone, Phlox! I suspect the problem lies elsewhere..
4 2
DAZ: Ah! Did you remember to pair to a memory statue before using the voyager stone?
5 4
PHLOX: Oh? I did not realize I needed to be paired to a memory statue to use the voyager stones! Is there a reason for this prerequisite?
6 5
DAZ: It is simple. Voyager stones use the memory statues' memory storage systems to record experiences from the projection pool, transmitting it back to the paired individual in real-time.
7 6
DAZ: That is how the voyager stone allows one to explore remotely beyond a projection pool!
8 7
DAZ: Without a memory statue to record those experiences, as you saw, the voyager stone would only function like an ordinary projection stone.
